thread.title: BRIEF-Brinker International Q3 EPS $1.08 Excluding Items

title: BRIEF-Brinker International Q3 EPS $1.08 Excluding Items
text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:21 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Brinker International Q3 EPS $1.08 Excluding Items Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Brinker International Inc: * Q3 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.02
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.03 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.08 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q3 REVENUE $812.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $806.6 MILLION
* CHILI’S COMPANY-OWNED COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES DECREASED 0.4 PERCENT IN Q3 OF FISCAL 2018 COMPARED TO Q3 OF FISCAL 2017
* MAGGIANO’S COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES INCREASED 0.5 PERCENT IN Q3 OF FISCAL 2018 COMPARED TO Q3 OF FISCAL 2017
* REVENUES FOR FISCAL 2018 ARE NOW ESTIMATED TO BE FLAT TO DOWN 0.5 PERCENT COMPARED TO FISCAL 2017
* COMPARABLE RESTAURANT SALES FOR FISCAL 2018 ARE ESTIMATED TO BE DOWN 0.5 PERCENT TO DOWN 1.0 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
